Humidity: 83 %

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries this morning. Periods of light snow beginning near noon. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light this morning. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 28 this morning and minus 13 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Tuesday 28 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 21.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending near midnight then clearing. Amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 26 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Tuesday 28 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Sunny in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 late in the morning. High minus 7.
